dynSentence.name: QueryPUBBSPCTLDetailSql
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT * FROM %s WHERE BAT_NO = ? AND (STATUS = 'U' OR STATUS = 'F') AND DO_FLG = 'Y' ORDER BY BAT_SEQ

dynSentence.name: QueryPUBBSPCTLSql
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT MIN(BAT_NO) BAT_NO FROM T_PUB_BSPCTL WHERE INST_ID = ? AND APP_TYP = ? AND SRV_ID=' ' AND STATUS = 'W' AND ((DUE_DT_CTRL = '0') OR (DUE_DT_CTRL = '1' AND DUE_DT = ?) OR (DUE_DT_CTRL = '2' AND DUE_DT <= ?)) AND DUE_BGN_TM <= ? AND DUE_END_TM >= ? AND (TOTAL_CNT >= ? AND TOTAL_CNT < ?)

dynSentence.name: UpdatePUBBSPCTLSql
dynSentence.sentence: UPDATE T_PUB_BSPCTL SET SRV_ID = ? WHERE BAT_NO = ? AND SRV_ID=' '
